morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are people or things being spoken or written about
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are more than one of them
morphInfos.description: _they should or must do themselves_ good
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly happens to or for people or things being discussed
